name: twelvelabs
description: TwelveLabs video AI integration. Index, search, and analyze videos using TwelveLabs' multimodal AI platform. Use slash commands like /twelvelabs:index to index local videos or URLs, /twelvelabs:search to search video content with natural language, and /twelvelabs:analyze to generate summaries, chapters, highlights, and more. Perfect for developers building video-based applications with semantic search, content analysis, and video understanding capabilities.
